listitem.para: For every object in the FlyMine database there is a details page which provides all the attributes, references and collections for that object along with additional information such as the GBrowse genome viewer for sequence features. (see Classes, objects and fields for an explanation of these concepts).

The object details page can be accessed from your results by clicking on the [details...] links. From this detailed results view it is possible to browse the information contained in the referenced classes (see screenshot below).
If you are using the 'Browse' search from the main query page, you may be taken to an object details page directly if only one object in the database matches your search.
